FacilityName: Finley Farmers Grain and Elevator Company

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Finley Farmers Grain and Elevator Company:
For further information, contact Kevin Corey, NH3 Plant Manager.  The owners and employees of the Finley Farmers Grain and Elevator Co. are committed to the prevention of any accidental release of anhydrous ammonia.  If an accidental release should occur, the facility is prepared to work with the local fire department to mitigate any release and minimize the impact of the release to humans and the environment.  The primary activity at the facility is the storage and handling of anhydrous ammonia for resale to farmers for crop production.  Anhydrous ammonia is received, stored, and distributed for direct application to crop land.  The maximum quantity stored would be 360,000 pounds in our (2) 30,000 gallon tanks and (1) 26,000 gallon tank.
This facility has implemented the provisions of the "Safety Requirements for the Storage and Handling of Anhydrous Ammonia, K-61.1"  Published by the American National Standards institute, Inc., and the Standards of the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administrations "29CFR1910.111 Storage and Handling of Anhydrous Ammonia.""  There have been no accidental releases of anhydrous ammonia in the last five years that have caused any deaths injuries, or significant property damage at the facility; nor to our knowledge have resulted in offsite deaths, injuries, evacuations, sheltering in place, property damage, or environmental damage.  The facility has a written emergency action plan in accordance with OSHA Standard 29CFR 1910.38.  The facility has provided state and local authorities the emergincy plan, and copies may be obtained at our office.  In addition, the facility has a written emergency response program in accordance with OSHA Standard 29CFR1910.120 including pre-emergency planning and employee training.  Safety improvements is an ongoing process at Finley Farmers Grain and Elevator Co.  Periodic evaluations are performed to assess the maintenance of safe conditions.  There are no

additional specific anhydrous ammonia safety recommendations to implement at this time.
Sincerely,
Finley Farmers Grain and Elevator Co.
